channel.title: Imperium on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Imperium on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: Brother Samial Venritus of Dark Angels
Sanguinius is not kind
item.description:
Hey everybody!
My fan art of the Sanguinius, primarch of the IXth Astartes Legion - Blood Angels.
I wanted to show that there is another side to Sanguinius. As he is always shown as a kind, caring creature his sons by their deeds stay very close to World Eaters and Night Lords.
